column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Clyde S. Kilby]]'''.

column1: *'''Subject:''' Tolkien is moving to the South Coast of England.
*'''Publication:''' A part of the letter was published as [[letter 304]] in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''. Other excerpts from the letter have been published in [[SEVEN 27|''SEVEN''
column2: Volume 27]] (p. 49). A longer part of the letter was published in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide|The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]'' (p. 726).
